categories: Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The mission to Rentalles was launched by the Rebel Alliance to recover a Hyperwave signal interceptor.
The Ministry of Supply was able to re-locate an abandoned listening post, so a squad of troopers was sent to locate the HSI.
The Imperial objective was to ensure that the Rentalles Imperial garrison was completely cleared.
The mission appears in West End Games' Star Wars Miniatures Battles Companion.
